name: x-treeverse
description: X-Treeverse Chrome Extension - Visualize X (Twitter) conversation threads as interactive trees - a community fork of Treeverse
author: zdyxry (forked from Paul Butler)

scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run build:css && npm run build:content && concurrently "vite build --watch --mode development" "npm run watch:content" "npm run watch:css"
scripts.build: npm run build:css && vite build && npm run build:content
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:css && vite build --mode development && npm run build:content
scripts.build:content: tsc src/content/main.ts --outDir dist/resources/script --target ES2020 --module ESNext --moduleResolution node && mv dist/resources/script/main.js dist/resources/script/content.js || true
